6863ad69-945e-4f49-a3da-4dac56bb07d7.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated comprehensive knowledge of the American judicial system and practical skills to assist trial attorneys including interviewing witnesses, investigating complex fact patterns, researching the law, and assisting in preparing cases for courtroom litigation. They also know how to locate and use legal authority in the litigation process, the basics of law office management, legal document preparation, and the role the paralegal plays in the law office.
6863ad69-945e-4f49-a3da-4dac56bb07d7.name: Paralegal Certificate Course©

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 12 modules. Topics include the American legal system, legal process, rules of civil procedure, ethics, torts, contracts, legal document preparation, legal analysis, discovery, legal interviewing, evidence, legal investigation, authority, citation format, appellate procedure, legal writing, drafting legal memoranda, and law office administration.
Apply knowledge and demonstrate paralegal skills through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

skills.name: Application Of Federal Rules Of Civil Procedure

40d0df1d-9d4a-4a04-9e2f-135341081891.description: Earners of this badge have developed the skills to advise law firms, health care providers, insurance companies, and governmental agencies on medically-related issues and to appear in court as expert witnesses. The curriculum design complies with educational guidelines specified by AALNC. This nursing continuing professional development activity was approved by the Colorado Nurses Association, an accredited approver by the American Nurses Credentialing Center’s Commission on Accreditation.
40d0df1d-9d4a-4a04-9e2f-135341081891.name: Legal Nurse Consultant Training Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 7 modules. Topics include the history, origins and growth of the legal nurse profession, legal ethics, informed consent, medical treatment decisions, medical records, defense medical examinations, case analysis, negligence, criminal law, toxic torts, and the role of the legal nurse consultant in the litigation process.
Apply knowledge of legal nurse consulting through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

202fbe68-16a5-47b3-912b-224b1896c0ba.description: Earners of this badge earned a certificate after demonstrating the foundational skills to assist crime victims through both criminal and civil litigation processes, adhere to death notification guidelines, identify patterns of domestic abuse and child abuse, implement techniques for intervention and notification, and assist crime victims in preparing victim witness statements. Badge earners are eligible for the National Advocate Credentialing Program Provisional credential.
202fbe68-16a5-47b3-912b-224b1896c0ba.name: Victim Advocacy Certificate Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include victim advocacy and legislation regarding victim rights; introduction to the legal process and effects of victimization on the victim; victim advocate skills and confronting bias; assault, battery, robbery, homicide and suicide; domestic violence; sexual assault, rape and child abuse.
Apply knowledge of victim advocacy through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments

a6afc04e-9d49-4cc8-8f5f-724e8d16e5f3.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated foundational knowledge of divorce law, important aspects of property division, alimony, custody and support in a divorce, post-divorce collection actions and necessary court actions after a divorce, common law marriage, prenuptial agreements, annulments, civil unions, adoptions, paternity and neglect actions.
a6afc04e-9d49-4cc8-8f5f-724e8d16e5f3.name: Family Law

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include Prenuptial agreements, cohabitation, marriage, and divorce; paternity and child custody; child support, spousal support and collecting support; property issues and annulments; intimate partner violence and juvenile court; adoption, assisted reproduction and ethics.
Apply knowledge of family law through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

bb9e1fec-2051-460e-be36-4bafe5b18009.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed six substantive law topic courses totaling 270 clock hours.
bb9e1fec-2051-460e-be36-4bafe5b18009.name: Advanced Paralegal Certificate Course

badge_template_activities.title: Apply knowledge of six substantive law topics through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.
Complete readings and discussions in six substantive law topics totaling 270 clock hours of instruction and 36 modules.

f691fe6c-6754-4a4f-96b5-70a20aca0072.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated foundational knowledge of the US Criminal Justice system and have the skills to assist lawyers in the criminal litigation process including legal document preparation, legal interviewing, client correspondence, and identification of elements of crime.
f691fe6c-6754-4a4f-96b5-70a20aca0072.name: Criminal Law

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the burden of proof, limitations of criminal law, defenses, inchoate crimes, crimes against persons, crimes against property, and the concept of punishment.
Apply knowledge of criminal law through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

d288d435-e690-433d-8d95-789a93007da7.description: Earners of this badge have foundational knowledge of the paralegal’s role in estate planning including creating enforceable wills and trusts. They understand important probate and estate planning terminology, can recognize estate planning legal issues, identify estate or tax problems requiring further research and investigation, are familiar with common estate planning documents and forms. Preparation of a will, revocable living trust and durable power of attorney is required.
d288d435-e690-433d-8d95-789a93007da7.name: Estate Planning: Probate, Wills & Trusts

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include estate planning, probate, living trusts, wills, power of attorney and tax problems in estate management.
Apply knowledge of estate planning through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

d9e057bf-59bf-442f-9bf6-db6c664c05d8.description: Earners of this badge have developed the entry-level skills to provide paralegal support to lawyers practicing business law. Earners can competently explain the fundamental structure and legal doctrines relating to general partnerships, limited partnerships, limited liability corporations, publicly-traded companies, the Uniform Commercial code and its function, government regulations related to conducting business and ethical considerations of the corporate paralegal.
d9e057bf-59bf-442f-9bf6-db6c664c05d8.name: Business Law and Practices

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include sources of law and business torts, intellectual property law, contracts, bailments, the sale of goods, negotiable instruments, secured transactions, agency, partnerships, employment, corporations and other business organizations.
Apply knowledge of business law and practices through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

39a8f704-1be4-476b-850d-f6f908238566.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated foundational knowledge of the system of common law property, the recording acts, conveyancing, mortgaging, landlord-tenant, and financing. They understand the role the paralegal fills in law firms representing clients in land transactions including buyer-sell issues, dealing with title insurance companies and recorders of deeds, as well as the documents which record the purchase, sale, and leasing of real estate.
39a8f704-1be4-476b-850d-f6f908238566.name: Real Property Law

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include estates in land, landlord/tenant and land interests; conveyancing and transfer of the deed; recording acts; title insurance and land finance; and land use planning.
Apply knowledge of real property law through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

552eedf8-65b2-497f-8b95-b2395bd12b16.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated knowledge of advanced and specialized approaches to utilize online legal resources available in a law library, and elsewhere, including the conceptual differences between computer-assisted legal research and hard copy research. They know how to formulate WESTLAW search queries and effectively and efficiently use WESTLAW and other online legal research methods as timesaving devices in legal research.
552eedf8-65b2-497f-8b95-b2395bd12b16.name: Advanced Legal Research

badge_template_activities.title: Apply knowledge of advanced legal research practices through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include elements of research, legal research on the internet, primary sources law, Westlaw research queries, and using head notes and annotations to locate mandatory authority.

7d8070f3-0e5e-446c-b07b-c469057b068b.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated knowledge of how the U.S. Constitution focuses on the rights of the accused and the impact upon our law enforcement system. They can explain the constitutional dimensions of criminal law and procedure and assist lawyers in representing clients in criminal proceedings.
7d8070f3-0e5e-446c-b07b-c469057b068b.name: Criminal Procedure

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the constitution and civil liberties; arrest, probable cause, search and seizure, warrants, warrantless search and seizure, consent searches, surveillance, police interrogation, Miranda warnings, confessions, lineups, right to counsel, waiver of counsel, exclusionary rule, good faith exception, privilege against self-incrimination, compelling witness testimony, and compelling production of documents; bail, and right to speedy trial.
Apply knowledge of criminal procedure through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

skills.name: Criminal Procedure Provisions Of The Constitution

d608a21f-bfdb-47ac-a42e-2ea0861a5b11.description: Earners of this badge have the foundational skills to assist crime victims through both criminal and civil litigation processes, adhere to death notification guidelines, identify patterns of domestic abuse and child abuse, implement techniques for intervention and notification, and assist crime victims in preparing victim witness statements. Badge earners are eligible for the National Advocate Credentialing Program Provisional credential.
d608a21f-bfdb-47ac-a42e-2ea0861a5b11.name: Victim Advocacy

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include victim advocacy and legislation regarding victim rights; introduction to the legal process and effects of victimization on the victim; victim advocate skills and confronting bias; assault, battery, robbery, homicide and suicide; domestic violence; sexual assault, rape and child abuse.
Apply knowledge of victim advocacy through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

e69eea8c-ae42-4f2e-819f-46dcc07e4aea.description: Earners of this badge have foundational knowledge of significant aspects of the immigration and naturalization process in the United States, including the Homeland Security Act of 2002 and the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996. They understand the role the paralegal serves in the law office assisting clients with worker and student visas, family residence requirements, removal, citizenship, naturalization and asylum.
e69eea8c-ae42-4f2e-819f-46dcc07e4aea.name: Immigration Law for Paralegals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the federal power to regulate immigration and visitors for business and pleasure; visas for temporary workers and temporary visas for students; employment based temporary visas for particular occupations and investor immigrant preferences; family based residency and visas; claiming asylum or protection; and seeking relief through appeals and citizenship.
Apply knowledge of immigration through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

c9c83428-d005-48ba-a7f7-aaffe4faa8da.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated foundational negotiation skills and how to select the most cost-effective and least intrusive ADR method to achieve the most positive result for both parties. They understand the processes and methods of ADR techniques including the proper application and limits of ADR techniques, the ethical considerations involved in ADR, as well as a basic ability to apply ADR methods.
c9c83428-d005-48ba-a7f7-aaffe4faa8da.name: Alternative Dispute Resolution

badge_template_activities.title: Apply knowledge of dispute resolution and alternatives to litigation through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the history, origins and growth of alternative dispute resolution, the art of negotiation, the mediation process, arbitration, other forms of ADR, labor relations and collective bargaining.

31e75721-0348-477a-8f78-7677c6cb05a8.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated foundational knowledge of law office ethics, law office etiquette, professionalism, organization, file management systems, calendaring and tickler systems, basics of citation format as well as the role of the legal secretary plays in law office management and working more efficiently within the law office.
31e75721-0348-477a-8f78-7677c6cb05a8.name: Legal Secretary Certificate Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the American legal system, ethics, reception duties, correspondence, file management, filing systems, calendar and docketing, fees, billing, accounting practices, legal document preparation, eDiscovery, and computers in the law office.
Apply knowledge of legal secretary job functions and duties through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

0c463ecf-6a0a-4476-86f2-9ecb11b0b82e.description: Earners of this badge have foundational knowledge of fundamentals of the federal constitution, including the institution of judicial review, the limitations on federal judicial power, the constitutional roles of the legislative and executive branches, due process of law, individual rights under the Constitution and the Bill of Rights, and redress for violations of the Fourth, Fifth, and Eighth Amendment rights of the US Constitution.
0c463ecf-6a0a-4476-86f2-9ecb11b0b82e.name: Constitutional Law and Civil Liberties

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include due process, equal protection, freedom of expression, allocation of powers, freedom of religion, state action, and congressional legislation in aid of civil rights and liberties.
Apply knowledge of constitutional law through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

d843734c-efa3-4065-a555-09ccfe6e2072.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated foundational knowledge of copyrights, patents, trademarks, unfair competition, protection of trade secrets, Federal regulations under the Lanham Act, and the role the paralegal plays in assisting law firms representing clients in intellectual property matters.
d843734c-efa3-4065-a555-09ccfe6e2072.name: Intellectual Property Law for Paralegals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the law of trademarks and the trademark registration process; foundations of copyright law and copyright registration and search; new developments in copyright law and the Semiconductor Chip Protection Act; the law of patents and patent infringement; patent ownership and transfer; and the law of trade secrets and unfair competition.
Apply knowledge of intellectual property law through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

e4d58eb0-454b-4bcd-b3b2-603837e3710c.description: Earners of this badge have foundational knowledge of the process to request and produce documents for legal purposes and an understanding of the role of the paralegal in requesting, producing and preserving electronically stored information (ESI). This course is endorsed by ACEDS, the gold standard in eDiscovery training and education.
e4d58eb0-454b-4bcd-b3b2-603837e3710c.name: eDiscovery for Paralegals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 17 modules. Topics include ediscovery legal framework, organizing ediscovery, technology, processing, reviewing ediscovery, production, ethics and international ediscovery.
Apply knowledge of eDiscovery through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

0c0ad7e0-a3be-4961-9e6d-bcd05ff3fb02.description: Earners of this foundational badge have developed the skills to provide paralegal support to lawyers representing clients in bankruptcy proceedings. They will demonstrate competency in preparing bankruptcy documents including petitions, statement of financial affairs, schedules, order confirming plans and multiple bankruptcy forms required as part of a bankruptcy action.
0c0ad7e0-a3be-4961-9e6d-bcd05ff3fb02.name: Bankruptcy Law

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the purpose of bankruptcy and how to access the bankruptcy code, ethical considerations in bankruptcy law, elements of a proof of claim, elements and differences between Chapter 7, 11, 12, & 13 bankruptcies and the procedural rules governing bankruptcy law.
Apply knowledge of bankruptcy law through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

5aa06d11-2c14-44a0-b1b7-58ea365b1415.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated foundational knowledge of legal investigation, law office ethics, torts and contract law, rules of civil procedure and evidence, interviewing techniques, investigation process and preserving evidence, admissibility of evidence in court, legal research and how to create a freelance legal investigation business.
5aa06d11-2c14-44a0-b1b7-58ea365b1415.name: Legal Investigation Certificate Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the American legal system, civil procedure, contract law, tort law, rules of evidence and hearsay, fact and evidence gathering techniques, handling evidence, interviewing techniques, legal research, and ethical considerations.
Apply knowledge of legal investigation through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

7d3de9a5-f67d-4fcc-b473-f906f77f2386.description: Earners of the badge have earned a certificate after demonstrating foundational knowledge of employment law including the National Labor Relations Act, the Railway Labor Act, employer and employee relationships, wages and hours, anti-discrimination in employment, minimum wages and maximum hours, as well as regulation of working conditions. CLS by BARBRI is recognized by SHRM to offer Professional Development Credits (PDCs) for the SHRM-CPSM or SHRM-SCPSM. 45 Professional Development Credits
7d3de9a5-f67d-4fcc-b473-f906f77f2386.name: Employment Law Certificate Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include labor management relations, economic weapons, racial discrimination, sex or national origin discrimination, age and disability discrimination.
Apply knowledge of employment law through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

37d47848-94e9-428f-83fc-f46a649facbc.description: Earners of this badge have earned a certificate after demonstrating knowledge of advanced and specialized approaches to utilize the legal resources available in a law library, and elsewhere, including the conceptual differences between computer-assisted legal research and hard copy research. They know how to formulate WESTLAW search queries and effectively and efficiently use WESTLAW and other online legal research methods as timesaving devices in legal research and legal writing.
37d47848-94e9-428f-83fc-f46a649facbc.name: Advanced Legal Research and Writing Certificate Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include legal authority and citation, legal analysis, Westlaw online legal research, preparing legal memoranda, the legal research process and types of legal writing.
Apply knowledge of advanced legal research and legal writing practices through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

d050682a-172a-4a27-9249-5cead6638e05.description: Earners of this badge have earned a certificate of completion after demonstrating foundational negotiation skills as well as how to select the most cost-effective and least intrusive ADR method to achieve the most positive result for both parties. They understand the processes and methods of ADR techniques including the proper application and limits of ADR techniques, the ethical considerations involved in ADR, as well as a basic ability to apply ADR methods.
d050682a-172a-4a27-9249-5cead6638e05.name: Alternative Dispute Resolution Certificate Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the history, origins and growth of alternative dispute resolution, the art of negotiation, the mediation process, arbitration, other forms of ADR, labor relations and collective bargaining.
Apply knowledge of dispute resolution and alternatives to litigation through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

2436dbc8-f985-401d-bfa0-f7631ff52cd4.description: Earners of this badge have foundational knowledge of laws that govern America’s public school system and home schooling, including student rights regarding discipline, suspension, personal grooming, testing and grading, and drug testing. They understand segregation, integration, dress codes and drug testing, They understand the role paralegals play in law office employment, as well as the role of teachers, school counselors, and administrators working in the American education system.
2436dbc8-f985-401d-bfa0-f7631ff52cd4.name: Education Law

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include attendance, religious conflicts, instructional program, due process of law, freedom of expression, student publications, unconstitutional searches, student discipline, racial integration and segregation, disabled students, civil liability, student privacy, student evaluations, equal protection, teacher employment, and discrimination in the schools.
Apply knowledge of education law through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

312195fe-b184-435d-8444-3a4c6c33e0b0.description: Earners of this badge have developed the fundamental skills necessary to advise law firms, health care providers, insurance companies, and governmental agencies regarding medically-related issues and to appear in court as expert witnesses. The curriculum of this course is designed to comply with the educational guidelines specified by the AALNC. Badge earners receive 45 Category 1 continuing medical education (CME) hours by the American Academy of Physician Assistants (AAPA)
312195fe-b184-435d-8444-3a4c6c33e0b0.name: Medical Professional Legal Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 7 modules. Topics include legal ethics, informed consent, expert witnesses, medical treatment decisions, medical records, defense medical examinations, case analysis, negligence, criminal law, toxic torts, and the role of the medical professional legal consultant in the litigation process.
Apply knowledge of medical professional legal consulting through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

6a542d2e-e56a-4f74-b4d2-a9eaeb491ca0.description: Earners of the Personal Injury for Paralegals badge have developed entry-level skills to assist with personal injury litigation including foundational knowledge of legal terms, causes of action, and remedies available to victims of personal injury accidents. They are competent in interviewing, investigating and other personal injury case building techniques for claims including car accidents, slip and falls, medical negligence/malpractice, manufacturer product defects, and class-action lawsuits.
6a542d2e-e56a-4f74-b4d2-a9eaeb491ca0.name: Personal Injury for Paralegals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include torts, elements of negligence, defenses to negligence, medical malpractice and reviewing medical records, intentional torts and their defenses, strict liability, product liability, nuisance and workers' compensation.
Apply knowledge of personal injury through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

13a6d000-b2f1-4f30-9c2b-c514355635d3.description: Earners of this badge have foundational knowledge of allocation of water resources in the American West, common law and civil law approaches for distribution of water in arid regions, transportation of water from one basin to another, and a hierarchy of competing uses for the water. They have specific knowledge of Colorado’s unique system of water courts and water judges, and understand the importance of the free flow of water between the US and its continental neighbors, Canada and Mexico.
13a6d000-b2f1-4f30-9c2b-c514355635d3.name: Water Law for Paralegals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the history of water law; riparian water rights; the doctrine of prior appropriation; states with hybrid water legislation; groundwater and diffused surface waters; and governmental regulation of water rights.
Apply knowledge of water law through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments

736a9ad5-57d2-4498-95aa-2ff029de35b1.description: Earners of this badge have earned a certificate of completion after demonstrating foundational knowledge of the process to request and produce documents for legal purposes and an understanding of the role of the paralegal in requesting, producing and preserving electronically stored information (ESI). This course is endorsed by ACEDS, the gold standard in eDiscovery training and education.
736a9ad5-57d2-4498-95aa-2ff029de35b1.name: eDiscovery for Paralegals Certificate Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 17 modules. Topics include ediscovery legal framework, organizing ediscovery, technology, processing, reviewing ediscovery, production, ethics and international ediscovery.
Apply knowledge of eDiscovery through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.

66e03c90-aaf3-40a3-a4b8-4115c8fb79a7.description: Earners of this badge have earned a certificate after demonstrating foundational knowledge of patent law including patent applications, research and prosecution, unfair competition, the law of infringement, and computer applications of software (protected by copyright) and hardware (by patents). They understand machines, processes, mixtures, manufacturing, compositions of materials and methods of doing business and research as it relates to intellectual property law and inventions.
66e03c90-aaf3-40a3-a4b8-4115c8fb79a7.name: Intellectual Property Law for Engineers

badge_template_activities.title: Complete readings and discussions in 6 modules. Topics include the business of intellectual property, getting ready for patenting, the patent search, the patent application, the inventor's notebook, patent prosecution and post granting.
Apply knowledge of intellectual property law as it relates to engineers through a series of exams and written assignments obtaining a 70% or higher on all assessments.
